Subjects: prayers, to Trinity; Trinity, prayers to
_description: A prayer to the Trinity — six 8-line stanzas, two stanzas addressed to each person

BLAdd20059.First Lines:
O Radiant luminar of light eterminableCelestial father potentiall
                    god of myght…
BLAdd20059.Last Lines:
…Agaynst all stormes of hard aduersiteBestow me gode lord by
                    thy preseruacion
BLAdd20059.Note:
Nineteenth-century transcript by Hunter is London,  British Library Addit. 24542, f.
                    181.
BLAdd20059.Editions:
Montgomery,  James,
                        ed.  
             The Christian Poet.
         Glasgow: Collins, 1827: 46.
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 80-1.
Hebel,  John William,  and  Hoyt Hopewell Hudson, eds.  
             Poetry of the English Renaissance, 1509-1660.
         New York: Appleton-Century-Crofts, 1924: 7 (three stanzas, attributed to Skelton).
